ApplicationData.text: Minimal SAMP application to test AppLauncher JNLP starting ability
ApplicationData.acknowledgment: This research has made use of the Jean-Marie Mariotti Center \texttt{AppLauncher} application \footnote{Available at http://www.jmmc.fr/applauncher} developped by IPAG, heavily based on \texttt{jSAMP} from Mark TAYLOR \footnote{Available at http://software.astrogrid.org/doc/p/jsamp/1.3-2/}.
